description: Generate a structured plan or outline based on a given objective or situation, incorporating additional information and desired specifications.

input_variables.name: objective
input_variables.description: The main goal or situation for which the plan or outline is to be generated.

input_variables.name: context
input_variables.description: Additional information or context that may assist in generating the plan or outline.

input_variables.name: output_format
input_variables.description: The desired output format for the generated plan or outline.

input_variables.name: stipulations
input_variables.description: Any additional stipulations or constraints that must be met in the generated plan or outline.
